Elements.Body: Thanks for stopping by today. I want to give you time to think about what I said, and come up with a decision by Friday.
I have trouble believing you’d destroy Dandelion for us.
Are you actually okay with destroying Dandelion just for us?

It isn’t only for you, I hope you realize. It’s more complicated than that (I know, I know, just about everything is). There’s a lot that’s gone on here that shouldn’t have happened, let’s put it that way. Ending Dandelion gives a powerful message to the Readers, more powerful than anything you and your friends could manage just by battling the Nightmares yourselves.

Just what will you do to ‘destroy’ it? I’m not trying to have blood on my hands.
I’m still not sure what a company’s ‘destruction’ actually looks like.
I’ll take care it if you tell me to. Remember, by Friday. You’ll probably want to discuss this with your friends - I don’t imagine it would be so easy for them to take in.

I don’t think any one of them trusts you.
I’ll try my best to convince them.
